DOMMatrixReadOnlyFlipX.summary: The flipX() method of the interface creates a new matrix being the result of the original matrix flipped about the x-axis.
DOMMatrixReadOnlyFlipX.returns: Returns a DOMMatrix containing a new matrix being the result of the original matrix flipped about the x-axis, which is equivalent to multiplying the matrix by DOMMatrix(-1, 0, 0, 1, 0, 0). The original matrix is not modified.
